
Dutch accounting module for Tryton ERP
--------------------------------------

This module is based on the l10n_nl from 
OpenERP's addons-community repository by
Jan Verlaan (www.veritos.nl).

It provides a chart of accounts based on
the semi-standard 'Bakker' chart, with added
rules for value-added taxes.

If you which to access the github repository
using Mercurial, please install the hg-git
extension: http://hg-git.github.com/

This module is provided as-is, without any
warranties, under the GPLv3 license.

For bugs in this module please contact the
author of this module, not the Tryton author.

---
Paul J Stevens <paul@nfg.nl>
